records.name: Tigerstone Garnacha 2023
records.description: A vibrant young Garnacha showcasing the variety's signature red fruit intensity and approachable style. This 2023 vintage captures the exuberant, fruit-forward character that makes Garnacha so appealing in its youth.
records.region: Spain (likely Aragón, Catalonia, or Campo de Borja)
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Bright aromas of fresh strawberries and red raspberries leap from the glass, accented by subtle white pepper and dried herb notes. The wine shows youthful exuberance with hints of cherry candy and a touch of floral violet character. As it opens, nuances of Mediterranean garrigue and sun-warmed stones add complexity to the fruit-driven profile.","finish":"The finish shows friendly length with lingering strawberry fruit and gentle spice. A touch of warmth from the alcohol carries through, while the wine's soft structure ensures easy drinkability.","palate":"The palate delivers juicy red fruit flavors with ripe strawberry and raspberry at the forefront, supported by relatively high alcohol that provides warmth and body. Soft tannins and modest acidity create an approachable, medium-bodied texture that emphasizes fruit purity over structural complexity. Subtle spice notes of white pepper and cinnamon emerge mid-palate, adding interest without overwhelming the primary fruit character."}

records.name: Alfaro Family Vineyards Trout  Gulch Chardonnay 2023
records.description: Alfaro Family Vineyards Trout  Gulch Chardonnay 2023 is a crisp, refreshing white wine capturing vibrant fruit character and bright acidity. Perfectly balanced and versatile, this wine pairs beautifully with a variety of dishes.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Citrus blossom, green apple, pear, tropical fruit, minerality","finish":"Clean, refreshing finish with citrus","palate":"Medium-bodied with bright acidity, lemon, stone fruit"}

records.name: Boplaas Hanepoot 2024
records.description: Boplaas Hanepoot 2024 is a sophisticated red wine showcasing rich complexity and excellent structure. This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining experiences.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs","finish":"Long, elegant finish with lingering oak and dark fruit notes","palate":"Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and spices"}

records.name: Adir Colombard Mevushal (MD & DC)
records.description: A kosher Mevushal wine made from Colombard grapes, produced under strict rabbinical supervision. The Mevushal designation indicates the wine has been flash-pasteurized to maintain kosher status regardless of who handles it, making it suitable for all kosher occasions while preserving the Colombard grape's characteristic bright, aromatic profile.
records.region: Unknown (Colombard is widely grown in various regions)
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The bouquet presents bright, lifted aromatics typical of Colombard with pronounced notes of fresh pear, green apple, and white flowers. Citrus elements of lemon zest and lime blossom add vibrancy, while subtle hints of honeydew melon and fresh-cut grass provide additional aromatic layers. A delicate floral note, reminiscent of acacia blossoms, adds elegance to the overall aromatic impression.","finish":"The finish is clean and refreshing with lingering citrus notes and a crisp, acidic snap. The wine leaves the palate cleansed and ready for another sip, with subtle hints of green apple skin appearing at the close.","palate":"On the palate, this wine shows refreshing simplicity with crisp green apple and citrus flavors taking the lead. The wine's natural high acidity, characteristic of Colombard, provides excellent structure and makes the wine feel clean and invigorating. Light-bodied and straightforward, it offers flavors of lemon-lime, white grapefruit, and a subtle peachy note, with the flash-pasteurization process preserving freshness while maintaining the grape's inherent bright fruit character."}

records.name: Murdoch Hill Sauvignon Blanc 2024
records.description: A vibrant expression of cool-climate Adelaide Hills Sauvignon Blanc from the acclaimed Murdoch Hill estate. This wine showcases the precision and purity that has made the winery a benchmark producer in the region. Crafted with minimal intervention and wild yeasts, it delivers exceptional varietal character.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The nose bursts with intense tropical and citrus aromas, leading with fresh passionfruit, lime zest, and pink grapefruit. Underlying notes of gooseberry and freshly cut grass add complexity, while subtle hints of white flowers and wet stone provide an elegant minerality. The aromatic intensity reflects the cool-climate Adelaide Hills terroir, with remarkable purity and definition.","finish":"The finish is long and zesty, with persistent citrus flavors and a saline mineral quality that keeps the palate refreshed. A touch of lemongrass and green tea lingers, showcasing the wine's excellent balance between fruit intensity and structural elegance.","palate":"On the palate, this wine displays brilliant acidity and textural precision. Flavors of ripe lemon, green apple, and white peach dominate the mid-palate, supported by a distinctive flinty minerality. The mouthfeel is crisp and refreshing, with excellent weight and concentration. A subtle herbaceous note adds complexity without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The wine's natural fermentation brings added textural interest and depth."}

records.name: Antonio Facchin Pinot Grigio (screwcap) 2024
records.description: A classic expression of Italian Pinot Grigio from the Veneto region, showcasing the crisp, clean style that has made this varietal a global favorite. The 2024 vintage emphasizes fresh fruit character and bright acidity, sealed under screwcap to preserve the wine's youthful vibrancy and ensure consistency from bottle to bottle.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Bright and clean aromas of green apple, pear, and citrus zest greet the nose with refreshing simplicity. Subtle notes of white flowers and almond blossom add delicate complexity, while a faint mineral quality suggests the wine's connection to its terroir. The aromatic profile is straightforward and appealing, emphasizing purity and freshness over complexity.","finish":"Short to medium finish with bright citrus and green apple notes. The acidity leaves the palate clean and refreshed, making this an ideal wine for multiple glasses without palate fatigue.","palate":"Light to medium-bodied with crisp, refreshing flavors of lemon, green pear, and white peach. The palate shows characteristic Pinot Grigio restraint, with clean fruit expression and zippy acidity that makes the wine incredibly food-friendly. A subtle mineral edge and faint almond note on the mid-palate add interest without complicating the wine's essential refreshment factor. The texture is clean and precise, with no oak influence."}

records.name: Backsberg Chenin Blanc (White and Blue Label) 2023
records.description: Backsberg Chenin Blanc (White and Blue Label) 2023 is a crisp, refreshing white wine capturing vibrant fruit character and bright acidity. Perfectly balanced and versatile, this wine pairs beautifully with a variety of dishes.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Citrus blossom, green apple, pear, tropical fruit, minerality","finish":"Clean, refreshing finish with citrus","palate":"Medium-bodied with bright acidity, lemon, stone fruit"}

records.name: Dogwood & Thistle Shenandoah Cabernet Franc 2024
records.description: An expressive Virginia Cabernet Franc from the prestigious Shenandoah Valley AVA, America's first established AVA in Virginia. This 2024 vintage captures the elegant, early-ripening characteristics of Cabernet Franc thriving in the limestone-rich soils and protected mountain valley climate ideal for this noble Bordeaux variety.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The bouquet presents classic Cabernet Franc aromatics with bright red fruit notes of raspberry and wild strawberry, intertwined with distinctive violet and iris florals. Subtle herbaceous qualities emerge with hints of fresh tobacco leaf and green peppercorn, while a characteristic vegetal strike adds complexity without overwhelming—ranging from bell pepper to leafy garden herbs. The cooler Shenandoah climate preserves the variety's signature freshness and aromatic intensity.","finish":"The finish is medium-length with persistent red fruit character and a gentle peppery spice. Fine-grained tannins provide structure without astringency, while the wine's natural brightness leaves the palate refreshed. Subtle herbal notes of dried sage linger alongside raspberry essence, showcasing Cabernet Franc's characteristic finesse and varietal purity.","palate":"The palate delivers medium-bodied elegance with flavors of bright red currant, crushed raspberry, and blackcurrant complemented by graphite minerality reflecting the limestone terroir. The wine shows refined tannic structure—softer and more approachable than Cabernet Sauvignon—with balanced acidity typical of cooler-climate Virginia viticulture (Region V classification). Mid-palate notes of pencil shavings and dried herbs add savory complexity, while the fruit-forward character remains vibrant and expressive without excessive ripeness."}

records.name: Boplaas Fledge & Co. Fume Blanc 2023
records.description: Boplaas Fledge & Co. Fume Blanc 2023 is a crisp, refreshing white wine capturing vibrant fruit character and bright acidity. Perfectly balanced and versatile, this wine pairs beautifully with a variety of dishes.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Citrus blossom, green apple, pear, hints of tropical fruit and minerality","finish":"Clean, refreshing finish with lingering citrus and mineral notes","palate":"Medium-bodied with bright acidity, flavors of lemon, stone fruit, elegant texture"}

records.name: Bonelli Bonarda Secco Dry 2019
records.description: Bonelli Bonarda Secco Dry 2019 is a sophisticated red wine showcasing rich complexity and excellent structure. This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining experiences.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs","finish":"Long, elegant finish with lingering oak and dark fruit notes","palate":"Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and spices"}

records.name: Two Mountain Sauvignon Blanc 2024
records.description: A vibrant Sauvignon Blanc from Washington State's first certified-sustainable vineyards in Yakima Valley. This family-owned, small-production winery crafts premium estate-grown wines that showcase the unique character of Eastern Washington terroir.
records.varietal: 100% Sauvignon Blanc from certified-sustainable estate vineyards
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The nose bursts with tropical fruit aromatics including starfruit, kiwi, and golden pineapple, creating an exotic and inviting bouquet. Hints of fresh-cut grass add classic Sauvignon Blanc character, while subtle notes of citrus blossom provide aromatic lift.","finish":"The finish is long and tropical with lingering passion fruit and citrus notes. The wine's refreshing acidity carries through to the end, leaving a clean, invigorating impression.","palate":"The palate explodes with flavors of guava, passion fruit, overripe peaches, and mango that create a lush, fruit-forward core. Just a touch of zesty anise adds complexity and interest, while the wine's bright acidity provides structure and balance. The mouthfeel is fresh and vibrant, showcasing the purity of sustainable viticulture."}

records.name: Zephaniah Adeline 2017
records.description: A tropical-style white blend from Zephaniah Farm Vineyard in Virginia's Loudoun County. This wine showcases the diversity of white grapes that can thrive in Virginia's climate, blending aromatic and fruit-forward varieties into a distinctive American wine.
records.varietal: White blend including Muscat Ottonel, Viognier, Petit Manseng, Vermentino, and/or Vidal Blanc
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The nose is aromatic and tropical with pronounced pineapple and mango aromas that create an exotic, inviting bouquet. Tree fruit notes including apple and pear add complexity, while floral hints from aromatic varieties like Muscat provide lift and interest.","finish":"The finish is clean and refreshing with lingering tropical fruit and citrus notes. The wine's bright acidity carries through to the end.","palate":"The palate showcases vibrant tropical flavors of pineapple and mango supported by bright acidity. Tree fruit flavors add depth and balance, while the wine's clean, fruit-forward character reflects stainless steel fermentation. The mouthfeel is fresh and lively, showcasing the purity of Virginia fruit."}

records.name: Napa Valley Burly Cabernet Sauvignon Special Selection 2022
records.description: Napa Valley Burly Cabernet Sauvignon Special Selection 2022 is a sophisticated red wine showcasing rich complexity and excellent structure. This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining experiences.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs","finish":"Long, elegant finish with lingering oak and dark fruit notes","palate":"Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and spices"}

records.name: Phelps Creek Cuvee Alexandrine Pinot Noir 2021
records.description: The flagship reserve Pinot Noir from Phelps Creek Vineyards, named after consulting winemaker Alexandrine Roy. This 93-point Wine Enthusiast selection represents a blend of all the estate's Pinot Noir clones from Columbia Gorge, showcasing the unique terroir of this dramatic Oregon AVA.
records.varietal: Pinot Noir (blend of all estate clones)
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Complex and sophisticated, the nose opens with layers of savory notes including forest floor and dried herbs. A distinctive twist of bright citrus adds lift, while tart red cherry and cranberry provide the fruit core. Wild yeast fermentation contributes additional aromatic complexity with subtle bread dough and mushroom notes. The Columbia Gorge's unique climate imparts a distinctive minerality that adds intrigue.","finish":"Long, savory finish with persistent red fruit, earth, and subtle oak spice. The wine's complexity continues to unfold, revealing new nuances with each sip and demonstrating why it earned such high critical acclaim.","palate":"Loaded with savory character, this wine reveals tart red fruits of cherry and raspberry alongside earthy undertones of forest floor and dried leaves. The palate shows remarkable complexity from the blend of estate clones, each contributing different facets to the overall profile. A citrus twist keeps the wine fresh and vibrant, while careful aging in one-quarter new French oak adds subtle vanilla and spice without overwhelming the fruit. The texture is silky yet structured, with fine-grained tannins providing excellent backbone."}

records.name: Hendry Unoaked Chardonnay 2021
records.description: A pure expression of Chardonnay from Hendry Vineyards in Napa Valley, crafted without oak influence to showcase fruit and terroir. Unoaked Chardonnay highlights the variety's natural citrus, stone fruit, and mineral character. The 2021 vintage in Napa was challenging but produced wines of elegance and balance.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Pale gold color with brilliant clarity. The nose is fresh and vibrant with aromas of green apple, lemon, and white peach. Notes of pear, citrus blossom, and subtle minerality add complexity. The aromatic profile is clean and fruit-focused.","finish":"Clean and refreshing with lingering citrus and mineral notes. The acidity carries through to an invigorating conclusion.","palate":"Medium-bodied with crisp acidity and pure fruit flavors. The palate delivers green apple, lemon, and white peach supported by mineral notes. Without oak influence, the wine's natural acidity and fruit character shine. The texture is clean and refreshing, with a slight creaminess from lees contact."}

records.name: Jeff Cohn Cellars Pure Pink Rose 2023
records.description: Jeff Cohn Cellars Pure Pink Rose 2023 is a delightful rosé capturing summer enjoyment. Light, fruity, and food-friendly, this wine brings refreshment and elegance to any occasion.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Fresh strawberry, watermelon, rose petal, subtle citrus","finish":"Clean, crisp finish with bright fruit character","palate":"Light-bodied with refreshing acidity, flavors of red berries and melon"}

records.name: Cantina Fratelli Pardi Montefalco Rosso 2021
records.description: A classic and honest expression of Montefalco Rosso from Umbria's underappreciated wine region. Produced by the Pardi family with a blend of Sangiovese, Merlot, Cabernet, and other approved red varieties, this wine showcases Mediterranean character with excellent balance and very good value. Professional critics awarded this vintage 88-90 points, praising its freshness and class.
records.varietal: Blend: 75% Sangiovese, 15% Merlot and Cabernet, 10% other approved red varieties
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Bright, medium-deep garnet color introduces a truly honest and classic nose. Mediterranean red fruits dominate—red cherry, red plum, and wild strawberry—with subtle notes of red poppy flowers adding floral complexity. A spiced herbaceous structure provides depth with hints of dried oregano, thyme, and bay leaf. Earthy undertones of forest floor and dusty earth add rustic character. A distinctive hint of Himalayan salt and mineral notes speak to the terroir. Warmed spices and green herbs complete the complex aromatic profile.","finish":"The finish is classy and refined with moderate length. Tart red fruit notes persist alongside earthy minerality. Soft tannins and good acidity extend through the aftertaste, maintaining balance. Herbal notes re-emerge subtly, adding complexity to the clean finish.","palate":"Medium-bodied and beautifully balanced, this wine displays exceptional appeal and drinkability. The palate mirrors the nose with flavors of ripe cranberry, tart cherry, and red currant. Dusty earth and grilled red fruits add savory complexity, while tart plum provides acidity. Very good freshness defines the structure, supported by soft tannins that never overpower. Good acidity keeps the wine lively and food-friendly. The integration of varieties is seamless, with Sangiovese providing the backbone and Merlot/Cabernet adding depth."}

records.name: Carinena Legitimo White
records.description: Carinena Legitimo White is a crisp, refreshing white wine capturing vibrant fruit character and bright acidity. Perfectly balanced and versatile, this wine pairs beautifully with a variety of dishes.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Citrus blossom, green apple, pear, hints of tropical fruit and minerality","finish":"Clean, refreshing finish with lingering citrus and mineral notes","palate":"Medium-bodied with bright acidity, flavors of lemon, stone fruit, elegant texture"}

records.name: Ontanon Gran Reserva 2005
records.description: Bodegas Ontañón's Gran Reserva represents the pinnacle of traditional Rioja winemaking, with the 2005 vintage showcasing nearly two decades of aging and development. This wine exemplifies the classic Rioja style, balancing fruit concentration with extended oak aging and bottle maturation to create a wine of remarkable complexity and elegance.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Dark red in color with no signs of bricking despite its age, suggesting excellent cellaring conditions. The nose opens with leathery cherry and dark plum aromas, complemented by classic aged Rioja notes of old leather and cigar box. Hints of tobacco leaf emerge alongside a burnt, roasted quality from extended oak aging. Subtle spice notes and vanilla add sweetness to the complex aromatic profile, while a savory, meaty character speaks to the wine's maturity.","finish":"The finish is wiry and high-toned with moderate tartness that adds lift and energy. Tobacco and oak spice notes carry through, along with persistent red fruit and leather. The length is impressive, extending well beyond the swallow with layers of complexity. Tannins are still present though fading, providing gentle structure without astringency. This is an elegant, refined conclusion that showcases the grace of well-aged Rioja.","palate":"The wine feels healthy and lively despite its age, with snappy acidity providing excellent structure. Flavors of dried herbs, vanilla, and tobacco interweave with sun-dried tomato, red currant, and leather. The palate shows remarkable balance, with fruit concentration matching the savory, tertiary development. Dark fruit notes of cherry and plum persist beneath layers of oak-derived complexity. The wine's moderate alcohol and vibrant acidity create a surprisingly fresh drinking experience for a wine of this age."}

records.name: Knuttel Family Sonoma Coast Pinot Noir, Bill's Hidden Track 2019
records.description: A boutique Sonoma Coast Pinot Noir from Knuttel Family Winery's Bill's Hidden Track vineyard, showcasing the coastal influence and cool-climate elegance that defines this exceptional terroir. This wine represents the family's commitment to small-lot, site-specific winemaking with meticulous attention to detail.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Opens with inviting layers of fresh red cherry, wild strawberry, and cranberry, interwoven with delicate floral notes of rose petal and violet. Subtle undertones of forest floor, cedar spice, and a hint of coastal sage add complexity, while a whisper of vanilla and toasted oak from thoughtful barrel aging provides structure without overwhelming the vibrant fruit character.","finish":"Medium to long finish with persistent red fruit echoes and fine-grained tannins that linger gracefully. A touch of earthy mushroom and dried herbs emerges on the fade, showcasing the wine's complexity and cool-climate origins.","palate":"The palate reveals bright acidity and silky tannins that frame flavors of ripe Bing cherry, raspberry compote, and red currant. Mid-palate richness brings notes of pomegranate, tea leaf, and subtle baking spices including cinnamon and clove. The coastal terroir shines through with a mineral-driven backbone and refreshing salinity that adds dimension to the fruit-forward profile."}

records.name: Martino Sangiovese 2020
records.description: A classically styled Sangiovese that showcases the grape's characteristic versatility and food-friendliness. While specific producer information is limited, this wine demonstrates the typical characteristics that make Sangiovese Italy's most planted red grape variety, with naturally high acidity and noticeable tannin providing structure and aging potential.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The nose opens with classic Sangiovese red fruit aromatics, prominently featuring red cherry and strawberry that define the varietal. Fresh raspberry notes add brightness and appeal, while subtle earthy undertones reminiscent of tea leaf emerge. As the wine opens, delicate hints of tobacco begin to develop, suggesting some complexity beyond simple fruit. The overall aromatic profile is medium intensity, inviting but not overwhelming, with a focus on purity of fruit expression.","finish":"The finish is moderately long with persistent acidity that cleanses the palate and makes you reach for food. The tannins linger pleasantly, providing structure without harshness. Echoes of red cherry and subtle earthy notes fade gradually, leaving a clean, dry impression that is quintessentially Sangiovese.","palate":"Medium to full-bodied with a firm structure characteristic of quality Sangiovese, this wine showcases red cherry as the dominant flavor, supported by additional notes of strawberry and plum. The naturally high acidity that defines the variety provides excellent backbone and ensures the wine pairs beautifully with food. Noticeable but well-integrated tannins give the wine grip and structure, coating the palate without excessive astringency. Subtle earthy tones of dried herbs and tea leaves add complexity beneath the fruit, while the overall balance suggests thoughtful winemaking."}

records.name: Seppeltsfield Riesling 2023
records.description: Seppeltsfield Riesling 2023 is a crisp, refreshing white wine capturing vibrant fruit character and bright acidity. Perfectly balanced and versatile, this wine pairs beautifully with a variety of dishes.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Citrus blossom, green apple, pear, hints of tropical fruit and minerality","finish":"Clean, refreshing finish with lingering citrus and mineral notes","palate":"Medium-bodied with bright acidity, flavors of lemon, stone fruit, elegant texture"}

records.name: Skylark Pink Belly 2017
records.description: A Grenache-based rosé from Mendocino County, California, sourced from Kurt Ashurst's vineyard just outside Hopland. The fruit is farmed specifically for rosé production, picked early to preserve freshness and bright acidity.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Pale salmon color in the glass. The nose is bright, fresh, and invigorating with aromas of just-ripe cherry, green strawberry, and watermelon. Citrus zest adds a lifting quality to the red berry aromatics, creating an inviting summer-fruit character.","finish":"Clean and crisp with citrus-driven acidity providing a refreshing close. The finish is medium in length with lingering notes of strawberry and lemon zest.","palate":"The palate is sleek and savory, with red fruits of summer given vibrancy by lemony acidity. Green strawberry, watermelon, and cherry flavors maintain freshness despite the wine's age. The texture is light and refreshing with good mineral backbone."}

records.name: Bitch Bubbly (750ml) NV
records.description: A fun, fruit-forward sparkling wine made from unoaked Chardonnay and Grenache, blended by renowned winemaker Chris Ringland. This approachable sparkler is crafted in a friendly style with emphasis on juicy berry flavors and refreshing bubbles.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The wine features dark cherry and raspberry aromas wrapped around a core of spicy pepper and anise. The nose is inviting and fruit-forward with sweet strawberry and raspberry notes. Subtle toffee nuances add complexity to the red berry character.","finish":"Long and luscious with a creamy texture. The finish is persistent with lingering flavors of strawberry jam, red cherries, and citrus, complemented by fine, refreshing bubbles.","palate":"Fresh berries, sweet candy, and citrus dominate the palate, balanced by crisp, refreshing bubbles. The wine starts with tart raspberry and black cherry, followed by grapefruit with a touch of sweetness. Fruit-forward character is balanced with the effervescent tang of the bubbles, creating a juicy but balanced core."}

records.name: Pasquiers Sablet Rouge 2017
records.description: A Côtes du Rhône Villages Sablet from Domaine des Pasquiers, representing one of the named village appellations within the Côtes du Rhône. The 2017 vintage is noted as being among the best for this appellation, alongside 2015 and 2016.
records.region: Côtes du Rhône Villages Sablet, Rhône Valley, France
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Deep red in color with a subtle and aromatic nose featuring small black fruits. The wine shows grapey, floral qualities with ripe texture and density. Black fruit aromas are complemented by subtle spice notes from the Syrah component and depth from Mourvèdre.","finish":"The tannic structure provides good length and persistence. The finish is structured yet approachable with lingering black fruit and subtle spice notes.","palate":"Deep, grapey flavors combined with black fruit greet from the beginning, with a ripe, floral touch. The wine has fine yet ripe textured density with a strong tannic structure that gives nice length in the mouth. With air, it takes on a luxurious creamy flavor and savory saltiness that adds complexity."}

records.name: Rueda Reina de Castilla Sauvignon Blanc 2016
records.description: Rueda Reina de Castilla Sauvignon Blanc 2016 is a crisp, refreshing white wine capturing vibrant fruit character and bright acidity. Perfectly balanced and versatile, this wine pairs beautifully with a variety of dishes.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Citrus blossom, green apple, pear, hints of tropical fruit and minerality","finish":"Clean, refreshing finish with lingering citrus and mineral notes","palate":"Medium-bodied with bright acidity, flavors of lemon, stone fruit, elegant texture"}

records.name: Bodegas Veiga Naum Rias Baixas Albarino 2024
records.description: A textbook Albariño from Rías Baixas, Galicia's premier white wine region. Produced by Bodegas Riojanas under the M. Victoria Dovalo label, this wine is aged briefly in tank to maintain the varietal's characteristic tension, clarity, and coastal freshness.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"A pale yellow color with green-gold highlights in the glass. The nose sparkles with clear citrus, floral hints, and tropical overtones. The aromatic intensity nicely combines fruit and floral notes with good concentration. Lime, lemon, and tropical fruit aromas are accented by delicate white flowers.","finish":"There's a distinctive saline note on the finish along with mouthwatering acidity that reflects the wine's Atlantic coastal origins. The finish lingers with citrus and mineral impressions.","palate":"Crisp and refreshing, the palate bursts with lime, lemon, greengage, and tropical fruit flavors. The wine maintains excellent tension and clarity, with a light yellow straw color and green-gold nuances. Vibrant acidity drives the flavor profile while maintaining elegance."}

records.name: Lambert Estate A Thousand Words Chardonnay 2024
records.description: An opulent, oak-influenced Chardonnay from Barossa Valley that showcases the rich, toasty style this region can produce. Hand-picked and basket-pressed, this wine is slowly fermented and aged on lees to develop complexity and creamy texture.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The nose presents vibrant gold color with fruity aromas of lemon, pineapple, and nectarine creating a tropical and stone fruit core. Toasty oak notes of butterscotch, melted butter, and vanilla add richness and complexity, while subtle hazelnut undertones provide additional interest.","finish":"The finish is long and rich with lingering butterscotch, vanilla, and toasted oak notes. The wine's creamy texture persists through the finish.","palate":"The palate is opulent and creamy with rich notes of hazelnut and butterscotch from oak aging framing the stone fruit flavors. Fleshy yellow fruit and vanilla tones create depth, while the wine's creamy texture from lees aging adds richness. The oak influence is prominent, giving the wine a toasty character that some may find dominant."}

records.name: Champagne Bauget-Jouette Cuvee Jouette Extra Brut Milliseme 2016
records.description: Champagne Bauget-Jouette Cuvee Jouette Extra Brut Milliseme 2016 is an elegant sparkling wine bringing celebration to any occasion. With fine bubbles and vibrant character, this wine offers sophistication and refreshing drinkability.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Citrus zest, green apple, brioche, almond, delicate floral notes","finish":"Refreshing finish with lingering effervescence and citrus","palate":"Light to medium-bodied with persistent bubbles, crisp acidity, flavors of apple and pear"}

records.name: Dogwood & Thistle Shenandoah Riesling 2023
records.description: Dogwood & Thistle Shenandoah Riesling 2023 is a crisp, refreshing white wine capturing vibrant fruit character and bright acidity. Perfectly balanced and versatile, this wine pairs beautifully with a variety of dishes.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Citrus blossom, green apple, pear, hints of tropical fruit and minerality","finish":"Clean, refreshing finish with lingering citrus and mineral notes","palate":"Medium-bodied with bright acidity, flavors of lemon, stone fruit, elegant texture"}

records.name: Chateau Jupille Carillon Saint Emilion 2016
records.description: A classic Right Bank Bordeaux from Saint-Émilion's Jupille Carillon estate, where 67-year-old vines produce wines of concentrated fruit and elegant structure. This 2016 vintage represents the stellar quality of an exceptional Bordeaux year. The estate's traditional blend of Merlot and Cabernet Franc showcases the limestone terroir of Saint-Émilion.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Intense ruby-red color with inviting aromatics. The nose is rich and complex, opening with ripe blackberry and blueberry fruit aromas. Notes of cassis and forest fruits emerge, complemented by vanilla and sweet spices from oak aging. Hints of licorice and subtle smoky notes add depth, while the aromatic profile remains fresh and integrated.","finish":"Long and satisfying finish with lingering black fruit and spice notes. The tannins are refined and well-integrated, showing the wine's aging potential while remaining approachable in youth.","palate":"The wine shows excellent balance between power and elegance. Ripe black fruit flavors dominate, with blackberry leading alongside dark cherry and plum. The tannins are still firm but polished, providing structure while the generous fruit ripeness offers sweetness on the mid-palate. Spicy notes and hints of tobacco leaf add complexity. The acidity lifts the fruit and extends the flavor profile."}

records.name: Mendoza Laderas del Valle Malbec 2018
records.description: An Argentine Malbec from the hillside vineyards ('Laderas del Valle' means 'hillsides of the valley') of Mendoza. The 2018 vintage in Mendoza was excellent, producing concentrated, balanced Malbecs. Hillside vineyards typically yield more intense, structured wines due to better drainage and sun exposure.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Deep purple color with violet reflections. The nose is expressive with aromas of ripe plum, blackberry, and cassis. Notes of violet, black pepper, and cocoa add complexity. Hints of vanilla and spice from oak aging integrate well.","finish":"Long and fruit-forward with persistent dark fruit and chocolate notes. The tannins are substantial but smooth.","palate":"Full-bodied with concentrated dark fruit flavors. The palate delivers waves of plum, blackberry, and dark cherry supported by notes of chocolate, coffee, and spice. The wine shows excellent structure with firm but ripe tannins. Balanced acidity provides lift and freshness. The mouthfeel is rich and velvety."}

records.name: Domaine de la Fontainnerie Vouvray Sparkling
records.description: Domaine de la Fontainnerie Vouvray Sparkling is an elegant sparkling wine bringing celebration to any occasion. With fine bubbles and vibrant character, this wine offers sophistication and drinkability.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Citrus zest, apple, brioche, almond, floral","finish":"Refreshing finish with effervescence","palate":"Light-bodied with persistent bubbles, crisp acidity"}

records.name: Domaine de la Villaudiere Sancerre Rouge 2019
records.description: Domaine de la Villaudiere Sancerre Rouge 2019 is a sophisticated red wine showcasing rich complexity and excellent structure. This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining experiences.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs","finish":"Long, elegant finish with lingering oak and dark fruit notes","palate":"Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and spices"}

records.name: Conde Valdemar La Gargantilla Garnacha 2019
records.description: A spectacular single-vineyard Garnacha from Rioja that earned 94 points from Wine Enthusiast and recognition as a 'Hidden Gem.' This 100% Garnacha showcases the intensity and elegance that old-vine Garnacha can achieve in Rioja's unique terroir, preserving the grape's vibrant acidity and delicate character.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The nose is beautifully expressive with vibrant red berry notes including raspberry and strawberry, complemented by floral nuances of violets and rose petals. Spicy notes of cinnamon and clove emerge, along with hints of dark chocolate and caramel that add depth and complexity. The aromatic profile is both intense and elegant, showcasing the terroir's unique characteristics.","finish":"The finish is remarkably long with persistent dark berry fruit, spice, and subtle chocolate notes. The wine's vibrant acidity and structured tannins linger, providing excellent balance and inviting another sip.","palate":"The palate opens with dark chocolate and caramel flavors wrapped in muscular yet refined tannins, rapidly joined by brilliant acidity that provides energy and lift. Flavors of pomegranate, blackberry, and orange zest create a complex fruit profile that is both powerful and delicate. The wine is flavourful and fleshy with good acidity that carries the intense fruit through a long, satisfying progression."}

records.name: Domaine du Joncier Lumen 2019
records.description: Domaine du Joncier Lumen 2019 is a sophisticated red wine showcasing rich complexity and excellent structure. This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining experiences.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs","finish":"Long, elegant finish with lingering oak and dark fruit notes","palate":"Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and spices"}

records.name: Conde Valdemar Blanco 2022
records.description: Conde Valdemar Blanco 2022 is a crisp, refreshing white wine capturing vibrant fruit character and bright acidity. Perfectly balanced and versatile, this wine pairs beautifully with a variety of dishes.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Citrus blossom, green apple, pear, hints of tropical fruit and minerality","finish":"Clean, refreshing finish with lingering citrus and mineral notes","palate":"Medium-bodied with bright acidity, flavors of lemon, stone fruit, elegant texture"}

records.name: Mauro Molino Roero Arneis DOCG (Damaged Tops) 2022
records.description: An incredibly expressive Arneis from one of Piedmont's respected producers in the Roero DOCG zone. This 2022 vintage captures the essence of the Roero terroir with vibrant fruit and floral notes characteristic of this historic white grape variety. At 12.5% ABV, the wine demonstrates the crisp freshness and aromatic intensity that has made Roero Arneis a benchmark for Italian white wines.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The wine bursts with vibrant citrus and tropical fruit aromatics, particularly grapefruit and ripe mango that create an inviting and fruit-forward bouquet. Floral undertones of honeysuckle and lily add elegance and lift, while subtle mineral notes hint at the wine's terroir. The aromatic profile is intense yet refined, showcasing the expressive nature of well-grown Arneis. Light hints of white peach and apple round out the complex nose, creating layers of interest with each swirl of the glass.","finish":"Clean and persistent, with citrus notes lingering gracefully and the wine's natural acidity keeping the palate refreshed. The floral elements return subtly on the tail, while a flinty mineral quality adds sophistication to the close. The finish invites another sip, making this a thoroughly pleasurable drinking experience.","palate":"Fresh and intense on the palate, with citrus and stone fruit flavors taking center stage in a harmonious, easy-drinking style. The wine's excellent acidity provides outstanding structure, creating a lively framework that makes this an ideal partner for food. Crisp apple and lemon notes dance across the tongue, while the tropical mango character from the nose translates beautifully to the mid-palate. The texture is clean and refreshing, with a mineral backbone that adds complexity and prevents the fruit from becoming heavy. This is an elegant wine that captures the characteristic Arneis balance of fruit intensity and structural freshness."}

records.name: Emek Reb Yose Capricorn Cabernet Sauvignon Mevushal (MD & DC)
records.description: A premium kosher Cabernet Sauvignon from the Galilee region of Israel, produced under strict Mevushal supervision with OU and Badatz Jerusalem Edah Hachareidis certification. Aged 18 months in oak barrels, this wine demonstrates the serious winemaking taking place in Israel's premium wine regions. The Capricorn designation represents the winery's focus on quality and traditional winemaking methods.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Rich and concentrated aromas of dark berries dominate the nose, particularly blackcurrant and blackberry, with undertones of cedar and sweet baking spices from the extended oak aging. Notes of dark chocolate and espresso add depth, while hints of Mediterranean herbs—rosemary and thyme—reflect the wine's Galilee terroir. As the wine opens, subtle vanilla and toast notes emerge from the 18-month barrel regimen, complementing rather than overwhelming the intense fruit character. A touch of tobacco leaf and graphite adds sophistication to the bouquet.","finish":"Long and warming, with persistent dark fruit flavors accented by oak-derived spice and a touch of leather. The tannins remain present but refined on the finish, suggesting this wine can develop further with short-term cellaring. A hint of dark chocolate lingers on the tail, along with subtle Mediterranean herb notes that add regional character.","palate":"Full-bodied and structured, with ripe Cabernet tannins providing a firm but approachable framework. The dark fruit core translates powerfully to the palate, where blackcurrant and plum flavors are enriched by layers of dark chocolate and coffee. The oak influence is well-integrated, contributing warmth and spice—cinnamon, clove, and vanilla—without dominating the fruit expression. Mid-palate weight is substantial, with good concentration and density that speaks to quality fruit selection. The wine shows excellent balance between fruit ripeness, oak influence, and natural acidity, creating a cohesive and satisfying whole."}

records.name: Napa Valley Burly Chardonnay 2018
records.description: Napa Valley Burly Chardonnay 2018 is a crisp, refreshing white wine capturing vibrant fruit character and bright acidity. Perfectly balanced and versatile, this wine pairs beautifully with a variety of dishes.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Citrus blossom, green apple, pear, hints of tropical fruit and minerality","finish":"Clean, refreshing finish with lingering citrus and mineral notes","palate":"Medium-bodied with bright acidity, flavors of lemon, stone fruit, elegant texture"}

records.name: Conde Valdemar Blanco 2023
records.description: Conde Valdemar Blanco 2023 is a crisp, refreshing white wine capturing vibrant fruit character and bright acidity. Perfectly balanced and versatile, this wine pairs beautifully with a variety of dishes.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Citrus blossom, green apple, pear, hints of tropical fruit and minerality","finish":"Clean, refreshing finish with lingering citrus and mineral notes","palate":"Medium-bodied with bright acidity, flavors of lemon, stone fruit, elegant texture"}

records.name: Jean Michel Champagne Rose Brut Mevushal
records.description: Jean Michel Champagne Rose Brut Mevushal is an elegant sparkling wine bringing celebration to any occasion. With fine bubbles and vibrant character, this wine offers sophistication and refreshing drinkability.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Citrus zest, green apple, brioche, almond, delicate floral notes","finish":"Refreshing finish with lingering effervescence and citrus","palate":"Light to medium-bodied with persistent bubbles, crisp acidity, flavors of apple and pear"}

records.name: Knuttel Family Sonoma Coast Pinot Noir, Bill's Hidden Track 2018
records.description: Knuttel Family Sonoma Coast Pinot Noir from  Bill's Hidden Track 2018 is a sophisticated red wine showcasing rich complexity and excellent structure. This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, tobacco, leather","finish":"Long elegant finish with oak and dark fruit","palate":"Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit, balanced acidity"}

records.name: Knuttel Family Wines Tentadora Malbec 2019
records.description: Knuttel Family Wines Tentadora Malbec 2019 is a sophisticated red wine showcasing rich complexity and excellent structure. This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, tobacco, leather","finish":"Long elegant finish with oak and dark fruit","palate":"Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit, balanced acidity"}

records.name: Oliver Viticultors Cava Brut Nature
records.description: An organic Cava from the Penedès region crafted by a family-run estate with 55 hectares of ecologically certified vineyards. This Brut Nature cava receives no dosage, allowing the wine's natural acidity and pure fruit character to shine through with refreshing vitality.
records.varietal: Xarel·lo, Macabeo, and Parellada (traditional Cava varieties)
records.region: Penedès DO, Sant Sadurní d'Anoia, Catalonia, Spain
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The nose is bright and inviting with a pale yellow color showing greenish hints, opening with white fruit aromas of green apple, pear, and citrus. Fresh fruit aromatics are accompanied by a delicate touch of orange blossom that adds floral complexity, while subtle hints of brioche and yeast from traditional method aging provide depth and interest.","finish":"The finish is clean and refreshing with persistent citrus and mineral notes. The wine's bright acidity lingers, leaving a crisp, mouth-watering impression that makes it an ideal aperitif.","palate":"The palate is crisp and ultimately classic, showcasing the three traditional Cava grapes with precision and balance. Flavors of green apple, lemon, and white peach create a refreshing fruit core, while the wine's naturally high acidity provides energy and structure. The absence of dosage allows the terroir and fruit character to express themselves clearly, creating a pure, vital, and refreshing sparkling wine experience."}

records.name: Ribeiro Sameiras Blanco 2021
records.description: A sophisticated white blend from Galicia's Ribeiro region, produced by Adega Antonio Cajide in Ribadavia. This wine showcases the indigenous grape varieties of northwestern Spain through a complex blend of seven grapes, anchored by Treixadura, Albariño, and Godello. Four months in French oak barrels adds structure and complexity while preserving the wine's essential freshness and regional character.
records.varietal: 55% Treixadura, 20% Albariño, 12% Godello, 8% Lado, 2% Loureira Blanca, 2% Torrontés, 1% Caíño Blanco
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Medium intensity aromatics with a pronounced fruity character centered on white fruit, particularly white peach and green apple. Fresh herbal notes of fennel, bay leaf, and cut grass add aromatic complexity, while subtle honeyed nuances suggest time on lees. The bouquet is frank and inviting, with white flower aromatics and delicate memories of honey that enhance the wine's expressiveness. As it opens, light toasty notes from barrel aging emerge without dominating the fresh fruit character.","finish":"Persistent and engaging, with citrus memories returning on the tail along with a slight pleasant bitterness that adds dimension. The aftertaste is long and clean, with the wine's natural freshness and acidity ensuring the finish remains lively and appetizing. White fruit and honeyed notes linger gently.","palate":"The attack is confident and broad, with good structure and a slight sweetness that rounds out the mouthfeel. Excellent unctuousness provides textural richness, balanced perfectly by bright acidity that brings freshness and energy. The fruity notes announced on the nose translate beautifully, joined by citric elements that add vibrancy. The wine shows impressive breadth and body for a white, with integrated oak adding subtle complexity rather than heavy wood influence. The combination of fruit purity and textural sophistication creates a compelling drinking experience."}

records.name: Jeremy Nickel Cellars Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
records.description: Jeremy Nickel Cellars Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 is a sophisticated red wine showcasing rich complexity and excellent structure. This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining experiences.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs","finish":"Long, elegant finish with lingering oak and dark fruit notes","palate":"Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and spices"}

records.name: Korde Pinea Rose 2021
records.description: Korde Pinea Rose 2021 is a delightful rosé capturing summer enjoyment. Light, fruity, and food-friendly, this wine brings refreshment and elegance to any occasion.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Fresh strawberry, watermelon, rose petal, subtle citrus","finish":"Clean, crisp finish with bright fruit character","palate":"Light-bodied with refreshing acidity, flavors of red berries and melon"}

records.name: La Mancha Vega Demara Crianza 2012
records.description: La Mancha Vega Demara Crianza 2012 is a sophisticated red wine showcasing rich complexity and excellent structure. This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining experiences.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs","finish":"Long, elegant finish with lingering oak and dark fruit notes","palate":"Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and spices"}

records.name: Swerwer Rooi-Groen Semillon 2023
records.description: An intriguing South African Semillon that likely plays with the varietal's dual personality, suggested by the 'Rooi-Groen' (Red-Green) name. This wine showcases Semillon's ability to range from fresh and citrus-driven to richer and more textured styles.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The nose presents a fascinating duality with bright citrus notes of lemon and grapefruit alongside richer elements of lanolin and beeswax. Green apple and gooseberry provide crisp fruit character, while subtle fig and chamomile add complexity. There's an underlying waxy quality typical of Semillon, with hints of fresh straw and white flowers.","finish":"The finish is clean and moderately long, with citrus zest and mineral notes persisting. A characteristic waxy texture lingers, along with a pleasant bitterness reminiscent of lemon pith.","palate":"Medium-bodied with a distinctive textural quality that sets Semillon apart from other white varieties. The palate shows flavors of Meyer lemon, white grapefruit, and green melon, balanced by a richer undercurrent of toasted hazelnut and wet stone. The acidity is refreshing but not piercing, providing structure while allowing the wine's inherent texture to shine. A subtle herbaceous note—fresh grass and nettles—adds interest."}

records.name: Alma do Mar Ruby Port Mevushal (MD & DC)
records.description: Alma do Mar Ruby Port is an authentic Portuguese Port wine crafted in the Douro Valley under strict kosher supervision (OU, Rabbi Padwa). This Mevushal wine represents a sophisticated sweet red with deep traditional character, earning praise from wine expert Adam Montefiore for showing excellent Ruby Port characteristics including ripe, rich fruit and impressive length. At 19% ABV, it delivers the fortified power and complexity Port lovers seek.
records.varietal: Traditional Portuguese Port varieties blend (likely Touriga Nacional, Touriga Franca, Tinta Roriz)
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The nose opens with a deep, captivating bouquet of concentrated red and black fruit jam, featuring intense aromas of blackberry preserves, black cherry compote, and strawberry reduction. Rich oak influence shows through notes of vanilla, cedar, and sweet tobacco, while exotic spices of cinnamon, clove, and cardamom add layers of complexity. There's a subtle floral quality of dried roses alongside hints of dark chocolate and coffee that enhance the wine's aromatic depth.","finish":"The finish is impressively long and persistent, with concentrated dark fruit and spice lingering well after the sip. A pleasant bitter edge of dark chocolate and espresso emerges, balanced by sweet fruit and warming alcohol. Tart cranberry notes add brightness to the fade, while the wine's richness and texture leave a lasting impression on the palate.","palate":"Full-bodied and richly textured with a velvety, mouth-coating presence characteristic of quality Ruby Port. The wine delivers waves of ripe, concentrated fruit flavors including blackberry, plum, and dark cherry, all elevated by the wine's natural sweetness. Oak-derived notes of vanilla and baking spice integrate beautifully with the fruit core, while the high alcohol content (19%) provides warmth without harshness. The wine is fruit-forward and approachable, showing the ripe, generous character that defines the Ruby Port style."}

records.name: Hendry Pinot Noir 2022
records.description: The 2022 Hendry Pinot Noir represents the latest expression from one of Napa Valley's most consistent producers of this delicate variety. From estate vines originally planted in 1972 and subsequently replanted with premium Dijon clones and Swan selection, this wine benefits from the vineyard's unique transitional climate position, creating Pinot Noir that bridges Burgundian elegance with California fruit expression.
records.varietal: 100% Pinot Noir (Dijon clones and Swan selection blend)
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Medium to full-bodied aromatics open with captivating scents of bright black cherries and fragrant potpourri, layered with subtle floral notes of dried rose petals and violet. There's a delicate earthiness reminiscent of forest floor and damp autumn leaves, alongside hints of black tea and sandalwood. Oak influence appears as vanilla bean, toasted almond, and subtle baking spices, while a distinctive note of ripe persimmon adds an exotic quality. The nose is lifted and pure, showing excellent aromatic complexity.","finish":"The finish lingers with persistence, featuring notes of ripe cherry, persimmon, and subtle spice. A touch of smoke and earth emerges alongside mineral notes that add complexity and depth. The silky tannins remain soft and approachable through the fade, while bright acidity keeps the wine fresh and lifted. The recommended drinking window of 2024-2030 suggests the wine has excellent aging potential while being immediately enjoyable.","palate":"Silky and plushly textured, the wine coats the palate with velvety richness while maintaining elegant structure. Flavors of ripe black cherry dominate, supported by red raspberry, cranberry, and subtle strawberry notes. The wine shows remarkable balance, positioned perfectly between the bright acidity characteristic of Burgundy and the fuller fruit approach of California Pinot Noir. There's vibrant acidity underscored by rich cherry fruit and subtle smoke, while fine-grained tannins provide gentle grip without astringency."}

records.name: Colle Corviano Pecorino 2022
records.description: Colle Corviano's Pecorino 2022 earned an impressive 90 points from Decanter World Wine Awards, showcasing this family-run, sustainability-focused estate's commitment to producing high-quality, affordable wines from Abruzzo's Colline Pescaresi IGP. This vibrant white wine from the ancient Pecorino grape variety demonstrates why this 15-hectare estate between Loreto Aprutino and Picciano has become recognized as a source of exceptional value in Italian white wines.
records.region: Colline Pescaresi IGP, Abruzzo, Italy (Loreto Aprutino-Picciano area)
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The nose bursts with vibrant aromatics of citrus and orchard fruit, led by bright notes of Meyer lemon, pink grapefruit zest, and crisp green apple. There's a beautiful floral quality featuring white flowers, acacia blossoms, and delicate honeysuckle that adds elegance to the aromatic profile. Subtle mineral notes reminiscent of wet stone and chalk emerge, reflecting the wine's terroir, while hints of fresh herbs including lemon verbena and mint provide additional complexity.","finish":"The finish is clean and persistent, with lingering citrus notes and that distinctive subtle mineral quality that defines quality Pecorino. Refreshing acidity leaves the palate cleansed and invigorated, with hints of white flowers and herbs remaining as the wine fades. The wine's energy and vibrancy shine through to the very end.","palate":"Medium-bodied with a refreshing, crisp mouthfeel driven by vibrant acidity that energizes the palate. Flavors of citrus dominate, featuring lemon curd, grapefruit, and lime zest, complemented by green apple and white peach notes. There's a pleasant mineral edge that runs through the wine, adding structure and depth to the fruit core. The wine shows excellent balance between fruit expression and acidity, maintaining freshness while delivering satisfying flavor intensity. A subtle salinity emerges on the mid-palate, enhancing the wine's food-friendly character."}

records.name: Lambert Estate Black Sheep Red Blend 2020
records.description: Lambert Estate Black Sheep Red Blend 2020 is a sophisticated red wine showcasing rich complexity and excellent structure. This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining experiences.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs","finish":"Long, elegant finish with lingering oak and dark fruit notes","palate":"Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and spices"}

records.name: Anko Cabernet Sauvignon Flor de Cardon 2022
records.description: A distinctive Chilean Cabernet Sauvignon from the Flor de Cardon vineyard that showcases the variety's power and elegance in South American terroir. This 2022 vintage combines concentrated fruit character with structured tannins, reflecting both the intensity of the vintage and the unique expression of its coastal-influenced origins.
records.region: Chilean coastal region (likely Maipo or Colchagua Valley)
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Deep and concentrated aromas of blackcurrant and blackberry emerge from the glass, interlaced with notes of dark plum and black cherry. Layers of cedar, graphite, and tobacco leaf add complexity, while hints of eucalyptus and dried herbs reflect the Chilean terroir. Subtle toasted oak notes of vanilla and mocha provide a sophisticated frame to the intense fruit core.","finish":"Long and powerful finish with persistent dark fruit and savory notes. Structured tannins and bright acidity ensure a mouthwatering conclusion, while hints of espresso and dark chocolate linger impressively, promising excellent aging potential.","palate":"Full-bodied and richly textured with dense black fruit flavors dominating the palate. Cassis, blackberry compote, and dark chocolate meld seamlessly with savory notes of black olive and dried sage. Firm, ripe tannins provide excellent structure without astringency, while integrated acidity keeps the wine balanced and fresh. Mid-palate depth reveals layers of spice, leather, and mineral complexity that add dimension to the concentrated fruit."}

records.name: LaMontagne Pinot Noir 2016
records.description: LaMontagne Pinot Noir 2016 is a sophisticated red wine showcasing rich complexity and excellent structure. This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining experiences.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs","finish":"Long, elegant finish with lingering oak and dark fruit notes","palate":"Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and spices"}

records.name: Valdemar Estates Walla Walla Syrah 2020
records.description: A distinguished Syrah from Washington State's acclaimed Walla Walla Valley, specifically sourced from the prestigious Blue Mountain Vineyard. This wine represents the Valdemar family's expansion from their historic Rioja roots into the New World, applying generations of winemaking expertise to one of Washington's finest terroirs. The 2020 vintage showcases the concentrated, elegant expression that Walla Walla Syrah achieves in cooler sites.
records.varietal: 100% Syrah from Blue Mountain Vineyard, one of Walla Walla's premier sites
records.region: Walla Walla Valley AVA, Washington State - specifically Blue Mountain Vineyard
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The aromatic profile is complex and inviting, opening with layers of red and black fruit - think ripe blackberry and dark cherry accented by exotic acai berry. A distinctive hint of star anise adds exotic spice, while baking chocolate and cocoa nibs contribute richness. Earthy notes reminiscent of freshly tilled soil ground the fruit, alongside a subtle touch of dried fig. Delicate lilac florals weave through the nose, adding elegance. As the wine opens, additional nuances of black pepper and violets emerge.","finish":"The finish is long and persistent with excellent intensity. Fine-grained tannins carry the dark fruit and savory elements through to a satisfying conclusion. Crisp acidity keeps the palate refreshed, while a sense of minerality and subtle oak spice lingers. The wine's energy and tension persist to the very end, inviting another sip.","palate":"Savory and stylish on the palate, this Syrah demonstrates considerable intensity while maintaining balance and finesse. A robust mid-palate delivers concentrated dark fruit flavors - blackberry, black cherry, and plum - supported by fine-grained tannins that provide structure without heaviness. The wine shows lovely energy, tension, and vibrancy, with crisp acidity maintaining freshness. Distinct savory character emerges through notes of olive tapenade, dried herbs, and black pepper. The chocolate notes from the nose translate to the palate as dark cocoa and espresso."}

records.name: Le Prieur Entre-Deux-Mers White 2022
records.description: A classic dry white Bordeaux from the Entre-Deux-Mers appellation, situated between the Garonne and Dordogne rivers. This 2022 vintage represents the fresh, aromatic style that has made Entre-Deux-Mers one of Bordeaux's most approachable and versatile white wine regions. Blending Sauvignon Blanc's vibrant acidity and aromatics with Semillon's weight and texture, this wine offers exceptional value and food-friendliness.
records.varietal: Blend of Sauvignon Blanc (60-70%) and Semillon (30-40%), possibly with small amounts of Muscadelle
records.region: Entre-Deux-Mers AOC, Bordeaux, France - between the Garonne and Dordogne rivers
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The nose opens with striking aromatic intensity, typical of quality Entre-Deux-Mers. Fresh citrus notes dominate - lime zest, lemon peel, and grapefruit - alongside green apple and white peach. Delicate white flower aromatics add elegance, while hints of grass and subtle herbaceous notes speak to the Sauvignon Blanc component. The Semillon contributes white-fleshed fruit character and a touch of honeyed richness. Mineral undertones and a whisper of wet stone add complexity to this expressive bouquet.","finish":"The finish is clean and refreshing with lingering citrus and green apple notes. Bright acidity keeps the palate cleansed and invigorated. Moderate length allows the flavors to fade gracefully, with the Semillon's roundness softening the finish while Sauvignon Blanc's crispness persists. A faint stony minerality lingers, inviting another sip.","palate":"Crisp and refreshing on the palate, the wine showcases the region's signature balance and nervousness. Bright citrus flavors lead - lemon, lime, and grapefruit - accented by green apple tartness and ripe nectarine. The Sauvignon Blanc provides racy acidity and fresh fruit character, while Semillon adds mid-palate weight, supple roundness, and notes of white peach and subtle tropical fruit. The wine is well-balanced, neither too lean nor too rich, with lively acidity maintaining freshness throughout. A subtle mineral quality adds depth and interest."}

records.name: Le Prieur Entre-Deux-Mers White 2024
records.description: Le Prieur Entre-Deux-Mers White 2024 is a crisp, refreshing white wine capturing vibrant fruit character and bright acidity. Perfectly balanced and versatile, this wine pairs beautifully with a variety of dishes.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Citrus blossom, green apple, pear, hints of tropical fruit and minerality","finish":"Clean, refreshing finish with lingering citrus and mineral notes","palate":"Medium-bodied with bright acidity, flavors of lemon, stone fruit, elegant texture"}

records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs","finish":"Long, elegant finish with lingering oak and dark fruit notes","palate":"Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and spices"}

records.name: Maison Roche de Bellene Bourgogne Pinot Noir Cuvee Reserve 2022
records.description: Maison Roche de Bellene Bourgogne Pinot Noir Cuvee Reserve 2022 is a sophisticated red wine showcasing rich complexity and excellent structure. This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining experiences.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs","finish":"Long, elegant finish with lingering oak and dark fruit notes","palate":"Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and spices"}

records.name: Nagelsforst Bergliebe Riesling 2020
records.description: An elegant German Riesling from the 2020 vintage that exemplifies the variety's hallmark transparency and expression of terroir. This wine balances pronounced acidity with delicate fruit flavors, showcasing the precision and refinement characteristic of quality German Riesling production.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The bouquet presents classic Riesling aromatics with bright apple and tree fruit notes leading the way. Subtle floral undertones add elegance and lift to the nose. As the wine opens, hints of citrus zest and white peach emerge, along with a distinctive mineral quality that speaks to the wine's terroir. Youthful and expressive, the aromatics show the variety's characteristic precision and clarity.","finish":"The finish is clean and refreshing with lingering acidity that cleanses the palate. Subtle mineral notes persist, along with echoes of green apple and citrus. The wine's precision and balance suggest quality winemaking and careful vineyard selection.","palate":"On the palate, crisp apple flavors dominate with medium-plus to high acidity providing excellent structure and freshness. The wine displays remarkable transparency of flavor, allowing subtle nuances of stone fruit and citrus to shine through. A balanced sweetness level—likely in the off-dry to dry range—provides roundness without masking the vibrant acidity. The neutral fermentation in steel tanks preserves the purity of fruit expression."}

records.name: Backsberg Sydney Back Chardonnay 2020
records.description: A distinguished Chardonnay from Backsberg Estate in Paarl, South Africa, awarded Commended at the International Wine Challenge 2020. This kosher wine is named after Sydney Back and offers an unoaked style that emphasizes fresh fruit and mineral complexity, combining intense fruit-forward flavors with elegant restraint.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The nose presents an alluring complexity combining notes of lemon zest, ripe melon, and hazelnut. Aromas of pineapple and tropical fruit mingle with citrus - particularly lime and grapefruit - while subtle hints of cashew and cream add richness without oak influence. White flowers and stone fruit notes round out the bouquet, creating an inviting and sophisticated aromatic profile.","finish":"The finish is fresh with a vibrant citrus conclusion that cleanses the palate. Lingering notes of lemon zest and hazelnut persist, creating balance between richness and refreshment.","palate":"On the palate, the wine delivers a fusion of intense fruit-forward flavors. Pineapple, cashew, and cream create a rich mid-palate, while the wine maintains freshness through bright citrus notes. Lemon, lime, and grapefruit provide a zesty backbone, balanced by ripe melon and stone fruit flavors. The texture is round and satisfying without being heavy, showing good concentration and weight. Despite being unoaked, the wine achieves complexity through the interplay of fruit, mineral, and subtle nutty notes."}

records.name: Bodegas Riojanas Monte Real Crianza 2022
records.description: Monte Real Crianza embodies the traditional Rioja style with modern refinement. Crafted by one of Rioja's historic bodegas, this wine undergoes careful aging in American oak, resulting in a harmonious marriage of fruit and barrel influence that defines classic Spanish winemaking.
records.varietal: Tempranillo with Garnacha, Graciano, and Mazuelo
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The bouquet reveals classic Rioja characteristics with bright red cherry, strawberry, and cranberry notes taking center stage. A distinctive American oak influence presents itself through aromas of coconut, vanilla, and sweet baking spices. Subtle undertones of dried flowers, leather, and tobacco add depth and traditional character to the aromatic expression.","finish":"A moderately long finish features persistent red fruit flavors accompanied by hints of cinnamon and clove. The American oak leaves a subtle sweetness on the close, while bright acidity keeps the finish clean and food-friendly.","palate":"Medium-bodied and supremely balanced, the palate showcases vibrant red fruit flavors of cherry, raspberry, and pomegranate. The wine's natural acidity provides a refreshing backbone, while the oak aging contributes creamy vanilla and gentle spice notes that integrate seamlessly with the fruit. Silky tannins coat the palate with a supple texture that speaks to the wine's careful élevage and the quality of the 2022 vintage."}

records.name: Born Rose Still 2022
records.description: Born Rosé represents modern winemaking's focus on quality still rosé wines with distinct personality. This 2022 vintage offers approachable elegance with layers of fruit and refreshing minerality, perfect for casual entertaining or contemplative sipping.
records.varietal: Rosé blend (potentially Grenache, Cinsault, or other Provençal varieties)
records.region: Unknown (likely West Coast USA or Southern France based on style)
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The nose presents an alluring array of red berry fruits: wild strawberry, raspberry coulis, and ripe cherry. Floral accents of lavender and orange blossom weave through the fruit, while subtle herbaceous notes of fresh thyme and fennel add complexity. A delicate saline quality suggests coastal influence, and hints of white pepper provide gentle spice.","finish":"The conclusion is persistent and elegant, with red fruit echoes mingling with citrus pith and a distinct mineral salinity. The finish remains dry and crisp, encouraging food pairing while maintaining standalone drinking appeal. A subtle bitter almond note adds final complexity.","palate":"Entry is bright and lively, with waves of red currant and blood orange flooding the palate. The wine's texture is silky yet energetic, supported by racy acidity that drives the flavor profile. Mid-palate reveals layers of pomegranate, pink grapefruit, and nectarine, while underlying savory minerality adds sophistication. The balance between fruit purity and structural elements creates a wine that's both refreshing and intellectually engaging."}

records.name: Bodegas Riojanas Vina Albina Gran Reserva 2013

records.name: Cantina Fratelli Pardi Grechetto 2024
records.description: A beautifully fresh and approachable white wine from one of Montefalco's respected family estates. This Grechetto Montefalco DOC showcases the simple yet elegant character of the variety through steel vinification at low temperatures, resulting in a wine that rarely disappoints with its straightforward charm and vibrant acidity.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The nose presents a simple yet pleasant bouquet dominated by white flowers - acacia and elder blossom - intermingled with fresh fruit aromatics. Notes of white peach, green apple, and citrus create an inviting and clean aromatic profile. Subtle herbal nuances reminiscent of fresh basil and a hint of fine olive tapenade add complexity without overwhelming the wine's delicate floral character.","finish":"The finish is clean and crisp, with lingering notes of citrus and white flowers. The wine's pleasant acidity leaves the palate refreshed, making it a perfect companion for multiple courses.","palate":"On the palate, the wine is refreshingly acidic with a glycerin-rich texture that provides weight without excess alcohol. Classic Grechetto aromatics translate to flavors of ripe pear, white peach, and citrus pith, complemented by herbal undertones. The wine shows medium body with good structure, while maintaining an agile, straightforward character. There's a beautiful freshness that carries through the entire tasting experience, with balanced acidity keeping the wine lively and food-friendly."}

records.name: Castoro Cellars Chardonnay 2024
records.description: A fresh expression from one of Paso Robles' pioneering wineries, this Chardonnay reflects Castoro Cellars' commitment to producing approachable, well-crafted wines at exceptional value. The wine showcases ripe California fruit character while maintaining the balance and freshness that make Chardonnay so versatile at the table.
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The nose presents bright aromas of green apple, Asian pear, and citrus blossom, complemented by notes of ripe peach and honeydew melon. Subtle hints of vanilla bean, toasted almond, and butterscotch from oak aging add complexity without overwhelming the fruit. With air, delicate notes of lemon curd, white flowers, and a whisper of tropical fruit emerge, while a faint mineral quality provides lift.","finish":"The finish is clean and refreshing, with lingering fruit notes balanced by subtle oak spice and a mineral edge. The wine's acidity ensures a crisp, food-friendly conclusion, while enough complexity remains to satisfy contemplative sipping. A faint note of lemon zest and toasted oak provides a pleasant closing impression.","palate":"Medium-bodied with balanced acidity, the palate delivers flavors of crisp apple, pear, and lemon, enhanced by richer notes of ripe stone fruit and a touch of tropical character. The wine shows careful oak integration, with flavors of vanilla, butter, and light toast complementing rather than dominating the fruit. A creamy mid-palate texture from partial malolactic fermentation provides richness, while bright citrus acidity keeps the wine fresh and lively. Hints of hazelnut and baking spices add complexity."}

records.name: Chateau Maris Rose Pays D'OC 2024
records.description: A fresh, organic rosé from one of the world's most environmentally sustainable wineries, Château Maris in the Languedoc region of southern France. This wine represents the estate's commitment to biodynamic viticulture and minimal intervention winemaking, delivering pure fruit expression from the sun-drenched Pays d'Oc terroir.
records.varietal: Likely Grenache, Syrah, and Cinsault blend (traditional Provence varieties)
records.region: Pays d'Oc IGP, Languedoc, France (Château Maris estate)
records.tastingnotes: {"aroma":"The nose presents vibrant aromas of fresh strawberry, wild raspberry, and watermelon, complemented by delicate floral notes of rose petal and orange blossom. Hints of citrus zest and white peach add complexity, while subtle herbal undertones of lavender and thyme reflect the wine's Provençal character. A mineral edge of wet stone provides freshness and lift to the aromatic profile.","finish":"The finish is clean and dry with lingering red berry fruit and citrus notes. Refreshing acidity persists, leaving the palate cleansed and invigorated, with subtle mineral and herbal echoes that extend the wine's conclusion pleasantly.","palate":"The palate is crisp and refreshing with bright acidity that drives flavors of strawberry, raspberry, and pink grapefruit. Light-bodied and elegant, the wine shows excellent balance between fruit sweetness and mineral-driven structure. Notes of melon and nectarine add depth, while the wine's organic, low-intervention approach preserves natural freshness and purity of fruit. The texture is silky yet energetic, with a subtle saline quality that enhances food compatibility."}
